abstract: Returns an array of asset tracks matching the specified media characteristic.
overview:
## Return Value

An array of tracks, which is empty if there are no tracks with the media characteristic.

## Discussion

Apple discourages using this method in iOS 15, tvOS 15, macOS 12, and watchOS 8 or later. Load tracks asynchronously using [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsset/loadTracks(withMediaCharacteristic:completionHandler:)] instead.

You can call this method without blocking the current thread when the data in the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsset/tracks] property is already loaded.

# tracks(withMediaCharacteristic:)

**Instance Method**

Returns an array of asset tracks matching the specified media characteristic.

## Declaration

```swift
func tracks(withMediaCharacteristic mediaCharacteristic: AVMediaCharacteristic) -> [AVAssetTrack]
```

## Parameters

- **mediaCharacteristic**: The media characteristic of the tracks to return.

## Return Value

An array of tracks, which is empty if there are no tracks with the media characteristic.

## Discussion

Apple discourages using this method in iOS 15, tvOS 15, macOS 12, and watchOS 8 or later. Load tracks asynchronously using [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsset/loadTracks(withMediaCharacteristic:completionHandler:)] instead.

You can call this method without blocking the current thread when the data in the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsset/tracks] property is already loaded.
title: tracks(withMediaCharacteristic:)
